content: --बालः, --डः, वालः, --लं, --डं {1} a ring, circle. {2} a collection, group, multitude, mass; कैरवचक्रवालं <ls>Bh. 2. 74</ls>; प्रकटयसि किमुच्चैरर्चिषां चक्रवालं <ls>Ratn. 4. 16</ls>; <ls>Mv. 6. 4</ls>; <ls>Mu. 3. 21.</ls>; <ls>K. 126</ls>, <ls n="K.">178.</ls> {3} horizon. (--लः {1} a mythical range of mountains supposed to encircle the orb of the earth like a wall and to be the limit of light and darkness. {2} the ruddy goose.
